sourcesContent:
<template>
<!-- 修改命令集 -->
<!-- style="top: 20px;" -->
  <a-modal
    title="新建"
    style="top:10px;"
    :width="600"
    v-model="visible"
    :maskClosable="false"
    @ok="handleSubmit"
  >
  <a-form :form="form">
   <a-form-item label="地图" :labelCol="labelCol" :wrapperCol="wrapperCol">
        <a-select
            showSearch
            placeholder="如需使用导航请先选择地图"
            optionFilterProp="children"
            @change="changeMap($event)"
            v-decorator="['mapId']"
        >
          <a-select-option
           v-for="(item ,key) in mapList"
           :key="key"
           :value="item.id">
              {{item.mapName}}
            </a-select-option>
        </a-select>
  </a-form-item>

   <a-form-item label="动作集" :labelCol="labelCol" :wrapperCol="wrapperCol">
     <a-input
       v-decorator="[
            'cmd',
            {initialValue: cmd,rules: [{ required: true, message: '请添加动作集' }]}
          ]"
       placeholder="动作集" />
    <a-button type="primary"  @click="showCmd">添加动作集</a-button>
   </a-form-item>
   </a-form>
 <!-- 获取cmd.vue中的cmdName的值 -->
    <cmd-list @getCmdId="getCmdId" ref="cmd"></cmd-list>
  </a-modal>
</template>

<script>
import { queryData } from '@/api/common'
import CmdList from '../../Cmd'

export default {
  components: {
    CmdList
  },
  data () {
    return {
      headers: {
        authorization: 'authorization-text'
      },
      labelCol: {
        xs: { span: 24 },
        sm: { span: 7 }
      },
      wrapperCol: {
        xs: { span: 24 },
        sm: { span: 13 }
      },
      cmdList: [],
      visible: false,
      form: this.$form.createForm(this),
      editData: { title: '' },
      mapList: [],
      cmd: '',
      circulation: '',
    }
  },
  created () {
    this.getMap()
  },
  methods: {
    changeMap (event) {
      console.log('选择项: ' + event)
      this.editData.mapId = event
    },
    add () {
      this.cmd = ''
      this.form.resetFields()
      this.visible = true
    },
    getMap () {
      let org = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')).orgId;
      queryData({orgId: org }, '/robotMapLib/getRobotMapLibList').then(res => {
        console.log('-----------getMap', res);
        this.mapList = res.result;
      })
    },
    getCmdId (cmd) {
      this.cmd = cmd
    },
    showCmd () {
      let mapId = this.editData.mapId == undefined ? 0 : this.editData.mapId
      console.log('地图ID:' + mapId)
      this.$refs.cmd.show('', mapId, 0)
    },
    handleSubmit () {
      const { form: { validateFields } } = this
      this.confirmLoading = true
        validateFields((errors, values) => {
        if (!errors) {
          var _this = this;
          let user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'));
          let orgId = user.orgId
          let userId = user.id
          let mapId = values.mapId;
          // let title = this.editData.title;
          let circulation = values.circulation;
          var param = { orgId: orgId,
            createBy: userId,
            entityId: values.cmd
            };
          console.info(param);
          console.log(values);
          queryData(Object.assign(param, values), '/cmdCollection/saveOrUpdate').then(res => {
            console.log(res)
            if (res.code == 0) {
              _this.$message.success('新增成功')
              _this.visible = false
              _this.$emit('ok', values)
            } else {
              _this.$message.error(res.message)
            }
          })
        }
      })
    },
    filterOption (input, option) {
      return option.componentOptions.children[0].text.toLowerCase().indexOf(input.toLowerCase()) >= 0
    }
  }
}
</script>
